attributes.action: Stop Anglophobia and make it illegal
attributes.additional_details:
Anglophobia is the dislike, fear and/or discrimination of England and/or the English and should be made illegal like other forms of hate & prejudice.

To positively promote England and the English through our rich and diverse culture and history from the likes of Charles Dickens, Sir Isaac Newton, Florence Nightingale and Emmeline Pankhurst,William Shakespeare etc

England is also home to the man who first abolished slavery,  William Wilberforce.

This green & pleasant realm has contributed significantly in the world of art, sport, music, social reform, invention and science and needs to be not only recognised but respected, applauded and celebrated and not stigmatised, forsaken and discriminated against.  England and the English are a proud historic people who have the same basic human rights as anyone else.

England has a lot to be proud of and the world has a lot to thank England for.

End Anglophobia Right Now
